game.name: TRASH: Tale of Wastetown
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, 캡션 이용 가능, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Explore Wastetown, a metropolis populated by trashes. Play as Slim, a cardboard box, in an action-stealth adventure among dangers and secrets. Will you be able to face deadly enemies and defeat a great enemy that has now taken control of the city?
game.shortDescriptionEn: Explore Wastetown, a metropolis populated by trashes. Play as Slim, a cardboard box, in an action-stealth adventure among dangers and secrets. Will you be able to face deadly enemies and defeat a great enemy that has now taken control of the city?
